channel.title: I need help whit use item on use item
channel.description:
hello i need something lik useitem on useitem ( for hiyascape )
i want this 2 items to use on each other and make a bandos godsword can somebody make it so they delete and get a bandos godsword out of it?
Item id: 15338 Name: Bandos hilt + Item id: 15331 Name: Godsword blade = item = 15334 Bandos_Godsword
please help me

item.title: I need help whit use item on use item
item.dc:creator: @se3_u se3 u
item.description:
@se3_u wrote:

no before i added it no eroor’s now i got 100 error’s im f**ked up[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2008, 04:38:27 PM[/size][hr]im happy i hade an old back up i need to add my old command only but can u post is where under exactly plz?

Read full topic

item.source: I need help whit use item on use item

item.title: I need help whit use item on use item
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

NOU Look again please:

else if(useItemID == 15338 && useWith == 15331) { { pEmote = 888; //<<------------ CHANGE THE EMOTE NUMBER deleteItem(15338, getItemSlot(15338), 1); deleteItem(15331, getItemSlot(15331), 1); addItem(15334, 1); sendMessage("You succesfully made your own Bandos Godsword"); }

Is Incorrect:

				else if(useItemID == 15338 && useWith == 15331) {
				pEmote = 888; //<<------------ CHANGE THE EMOTE NUMBER
				deleteItem(15338, getItemSlot(15338), 1);
				deleteItem(15331, getItemSlot(15331), 1);
				addItem(15334, 1);
				sendMessage("You succesfully made your own Bandos Godsword");
				}

Is Correct.

Read full topic
